column1: NGR is from the 1950s record for Ffestiniog Penmaesllan because I think the observer for both locations, Ffestiniog U. D. C. has mixed up the NGRs for the locations.
The NGR on the record of SH701422 is 2 miles south of Manod. The altitudes are a better match but the relationships to Manod church and station suggest the gauge might be up to 500 m North.
